title: Shunsuke Mori
text:
is a <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player of a Peruvian father. He plays for <a href="Albirex%20Niigata">Albirex Niigata</a>.
Career.
Shunsuke Mori joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Albirex%20Niigata">Albirex Niigata</a> in 2017, but in January 2018 he switched to <a href="Tokyo%20Verdy">Tokyo Verdy</a> on loan.
Club statistics.
"Updated to 22 February 2020".
